name: Stone Flood
description:
Stone Flood is a simple, addictive and easy to play puzzle game for you Mac.

The goal of the game is to flood the board with a single color! Be fast and keep your number of moves low in order to score high! Start from the lower left corner and expand an area of same-colored stones by choosing between the different colored stone buttons. Each level has individually calculated minimum time and steps to achieve. Stone Flood is the perfect game for passing the time.

Be prepared for:
• More than 300 Levels
• Random Games
• Different board sizes
• Game Center Support
• Craze Factor
